sqlMap.update: INSERT INTO TBL_BP_MEASURE_INFO ( MEASURE_SEQ ,PATIENT_CD ,SYSTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE ,DIASTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE ,HEART_RATE_MEASURE_VALUE ,MEASURE_DT ,MEASURE_TIME ,SYSTOLE_BP_STATE ,DIASTOLE_BP_STATE ,DEL_YN ,REG_DTTM ) SELECT BP_MEASURE_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#PATIENT_CD# ,CRYPTO_AES256.ENC_AES(#SYSTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE#) ,CRYPTO_AES256.ENC_AES(#DIASTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE#) ,CRYPTO_AES256.ENC_AES(#HEART_RATE_MEASURE_VALUE#) ,#MEASURE_DT# ,#MEASURE_TIME# ,( SELECT DISEASE_STATE FROM TBL_DISEASE_STDR_INFO WHERE DISEASE_CD='0002' AND MEASURE_GB='01' AND STDR_VALUE_FROM<=#SYSTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE# AND STDR_VALUE_TO>=#SYSTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE# ) ,( SELECT DISEASE_STATE FROM TBL_DISEASE_STDR_INFO WHERE DISEASE_CD='0002' AND MEASURE_GB='02' AND STDR_VALUE_FROM<=#DIASTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE# AND STDR_VALUE_TO>=#DIASTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE# ) , 'N' ,SYSDATE FROM DUAL

UPDATE TBL_BP_MEASURE_INFO SET ( SYSTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE ,DIASTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE ,HEART_RATE_MEASURE_VALUE ,MEASURE_DT ,MEASURE_TIME ,SYSTOLE_BP_STATE ,DIASTOLE_BP_STATE ,DEL_YN ,REG_DTTM ) = ( SELECT CRYPTO_AES256.ENC_AES(#SYSTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE#) ,CRYPTO_AES256.ENC_AES(#DIASTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE#) ,CRYPTO_AES256.ENC_AES(#HEART_RATE_MEASURE_VALUE#) ,#MEASURE_DT# ,#MEASURE_TIME# ,( SELECT DISEASE_STATE FROM TBL_DISEASE_STDR_INFO WHERE DISEASE_CD='0002' AND MEASURE_GB='01' AND STDR_VALUE_FROM<=#SYSTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE# AND STDR_VALUE_TO>=#SYSTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE# ) ,( SELECT DISEASE_STATE FROM TBL_DISEASE_STDR_INFO WHERE DISEASE_CD='0002' AND MEASURE_GB='02' AND STDR_VALUE_FROM<=#DIASTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE# AND STDR_VALUE_TO>=#DIASTOLE_MEASURE_VALUE# ) ,'N' ,SYSDATE FROM DUAL ) WHERE MEASURE_SEQ=#MEASURE_SEQ#
